评论详情: Great fit and quality.  Material is thicker and comfortable.
I bought this for my friends daughter and she loved it. She says, the style  and quality are both good.
It was to big I send it back they charge me restocking fee. No where said they would do that. I was so disappointed.  I need a smaller size. But not going to get it. $8 restocking fee.
My daughter loves this pair of jeans.  She wears it to school often.  Great for a middle schooler.  True to size and comfortable.
My 12 year old daughter loves these. But they run a little baggy and get worse as the day goes on so beware of that. But they are very cute and wool get lots of use out of them.

I bought a pair of pants for my daughter’s birthday, but they were too big. So I kept them and ordered another pair for my daughter. They are so cute. I got a lot of compliments on them.  I gave 4 stars because the waist is not comfortable. My body shape is average. I’m a runner and my waist is not big, but the waist makes me feel a little tight.
Jeans are super cute. Even after second attempt first M then S for 5'6" 120 lb. But coming out of the bag smelled of chemical and "looked" dirty with a yellow tinge. Buy USA I guess.

These took forever to arrive so I was incredibly disappointed to find that they really weren't like the pictures at all.  They are not long enough to be baggy.  The color was more dirty and used than the blue shown.  They don't sit well on the waist and are totally unflattering.
Can't wear them because the crotch is too baggy

Compré este pantalón para mi hija de 11 años guiándome por las reseñas.  La talla no corresponde,  arma muy mal.  Finalmente me quedó a mi.  No deberían ofrecerlo entre tallas de niñas,  es para mujeres  adultas con caderas.
These are good quality, and my daughter loves them.
Buen producto de excelente calidad
I love these jeans very cute sizing is pretty accurate

评论概述: Adorable, fits well and looks so cute!
评论详情: I did not want to buy these for my 11 year old daughter, I did not think she would like them and didn’t like how they looked…they are ADORABLE!!! They fit well, look so cute and now I want a pair!
Are amazingly comfortable. Great quality, heavy denim.
Good fit , gives that oversized look but still nice and the waist was a good size. Also somewhat baggy but not dragging on the floor. I love the star design , made it unique.
High Waist Wide Leg Y2K Jeans. Fits to size. Very comfortable. Makes a great gift. I highly recommend.

Pretty average pair of jeans, although I would say it is overpriced for its quality. Overall quality feels cheap and legs aren't as long as pictured / what I thought they would be. Looks slightly different from the picture but is a decent pair of jeans. Although I would say try and find a better quality pair of jeans rather than this one. Keeping but not impressed👍

So the sizing chart was a little odd when ordering - the largest size was an M. I would have normally tried a large- but this size was good - sort of. The legs were wide and roomy - like a large size. The waist was a lot smaller - I barely can get the button done :/ The waist is more of a size small/medium - and just odd. I do love the star cut outs on these - they're fun and give these jeans a unique look. The wash is also a nice blue, not too dark, but sort of light and vintage. I washed these first - they came bagged with an odd odor. There are no tags or labels either... also a little odd. I can do some work to make these work but they are very different from "standard" sizing, but they do have a great look! very fun!
Fit great
Order a size up and it's perfect
Pas bien fait au niveau de la taille en avant et trop large au niveau des jambes
